name: Plant Avoider
description:
NEWLY UPDATED - the hit web game has been brought to life once more! (literally doing this for the sake of having all my games work)

You are the orangey-blob called Blob, a young little blob enjoying the lovely Sunday sun, when suddenly something terrible has happened and potted plants and whales are falling from the sky!

Use the A/D Keys to maneouvre Blob away from these falling objects as long as you can!

When you are finished the Menu contains a small leaderboard to compare scores, who can keep Blob safest the longest?
